meanings.definition: The quality of being attractive or pleasing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her comeliness caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The actress's comeliness made her the star of the show.
meanings.sent3: Despite her comeliness, she always tripped over her own feet.
meanings.sent4: The comeliness of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with comeliness, from the blooming flowers to the chirping birds.

meanings.definition: The state of being physically attractive or beautiful.
meanings.sent1: The comeliness of the model on the magazine cover was undeniable.
meanings.sent2: People were mesmerized by the comeliness of the bride on her wedding day.
meanings.sent3: The comeliness of the puppy made everyone in the room smile.
meanings.sent4: The comeliness of the mountain peak took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The comeliness of the old oak tree in the park was a sight to behold.
